name: BeamTron 5500
description:
The Earth is in trouble. Again!!! This time from a mysterious interstellar force attacking from a distance with deadly force. It is up to you, the player, to balance the planets resources AND master the state-of-the-art defense system "BEAM-TRON 5500". It will take mad typing skills, multitasking powers and endless pots of fancy coffee. Keep us alive!!!

The team:

- Panagiotis Iatrou [Programming]

- Thomas Finholm [Art]

- Will Leamon [Audio]
